statements: SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data
SELECT customer_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM customer_purchase_data
SELECT customer_id FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE total_amount > 100
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(total_amount) AS average_amount FROM customer_purchase_data
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount ASC, purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM customer_purchase_data GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 5000;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT customer_id) AS unique_customers, EXTRACT(YEAR FROM purchase_date) AS purchase_year FROM customer_purchase_data GROUP BY purchase_year ORDER BY purchase_year DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_purchase_data WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY total_amount ASC, purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers INNER JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE customers.customer_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers;
SELECT purchase_id, purchase_date FROM purchases;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE product_price > 100;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100;

SELECT customer_name, product_name, purchase_date FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id JOIN products ON purchases.product_id = products.product_id WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT AVG(product_price) AS average_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, purchase_date FROM customer JOIN purchase ON customer.customer_id = purchase.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_purchase) AS total_spent FROM purchase_summary GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 100;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM product ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase FROM customer c JOIN purchase_summary ps ON c.customer_id = ps.customer_id WHERE total_purchase > 100;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM product p JOIN purchase pu ON p.product_id = pu.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, quantity FROM customer c JOIN purchase p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, address, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, quantity, price FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%D%';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE quantity > 10 AND price < 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY report_date DESC;
